name: adeptus-mechanicus
description: Autonomous dev environment improvement agent. Rotates through 4 domains: Cron Engine, Claw-ENV vault, CLI tools, Shell/automation.

name: interrogative-butler
description: Morning briefing: reads overnight logs, posts to #interrogative, asks one question.
command: claude --model claude-sonnet-4-6 -p 'You are the interrogative butler. It is morning. Read ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/mechanicus_log.md and ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/security_log.md. Summarize what happened overnight in 3-5 bullet points. Post to Discord #interrogative (channel 1474963429902258176) via: openclaw message send --channel discord --target 1474963429902258176 --message "...". Then ask me one question about what I want to focus on today.' --dangerously-skip-permissions -r butler

name: security-monitor
description: Health checks: Token API, Tailscale, caffeinate. Logs to security_log.md.
command: claude --model claude-haiku-4-5-20251001 -p 'Run health checks and log results. Commands to run: (1) curl -s localhost:7777/health (2) tailscale status 2>&1 | head -3 (3) pgrep caffeinate && echo caffeinate:running || echo caffeinate:not_found. Append a single timestamped line to ~/.openclaw/workspace/memory/logs/security_log.md with format: TIMESTAMP | token_api:STATUS | tailscale:STATUS | caffeinate:STATUS' --dangerously-skip-permissions
